wikimediacampaignevents-grant-id-input-l: Label for the optional [[:m:Special:MyLanguage/Grants:Administration/Eligibility|Grant ID]] field displayed on [[Special:EditEventRegistration]] and [[Special:EnableEventRegistration]]. These are special pages of the CampaignEvents extension
wikimediacampaignevents-grant-id-input-p: Placeholder for the optional Grant ID field ({{msg-mw|wikimediacampaignevents-grant-id-input-label}}) displayed on [[Special:EditEventRegistration]] and [[Special:EnableEventRegistration]]. These are special pages of the CampaignEvents extension. The numbers in this message (like: 1201-3302) represent a Grant ID and should not be translated or formatted in any way.
wikimediacampaignevents-grant-id-input-h: Help message for the optional Grant ID field ({{msg-mw|wikimediacampaignevents-grant-id-input-label}}) displayed on [[Special:EditEventRegistration]] and [[Special:EnableEventRegistration]]. These are special pages of the CampaignEvents extension. The numbers in this message represent a Grant ID and should not be translated or formatted in any way.
wikimediacampaignevents-grant-id-invalid: Error message shown on [[Special:EditEventRegistration]] and [[Special:EnableEventRegistration]] in case the provided grant ID field ({{msg-mw|wikimediacampaignevents-grant-id-input-label}}) is invalid
wikimediacampaignevents-grant-id-api-fai: Error message shown on [[Special:EditEventRegistration]] and [[Special:EnableEventRegistration]] in case the API call to validate the grant ID ({{msg-mw|wikimediacampaignevents-grant-id-input-label}}) fails.
wikimediacampaignevents-grant-id-event-d: Label for [[:m:Special:MyLanguage/Grants:Administration/Eligibility|Grant ID]] displayed on [[Special:EventDetails]], this is a special page of the CampaignEvents extension
wikimediacampaignevents-collaboration-li: Description of the collaboration list tab on [[Special:AllEvents]]. This is a list of ways in which users can collaborate, such as events and WikiProjects.
Notice title used on [[Special:AllEvents]] to notify that no wikiprojects have been found.
Notice text used on [[Special:AllEvents]] to notify that no wikiprojects have been found.
Header text used on [[Special:AllEvents]] to explain the use of the communities tab.
Error title used on [[Special:AllEvents]] to alert that an API error has occurred.
Error text used on [[Special:AllEvents]] to alert that a WDQS API error has occurred.
Error text used on [[Special:AllEvents]] to alert that a wikibase API error has occurred. Indicates that no WikiProjects information will be available at all.
page-collection-tracking-category:
{{tracking category name}}
The [[:mw:Special:MyLanguage/Help:Tracking categories|tracking category]] to add to the pages that contain a translation campaign page marker
page-collection-tracking-category-desc: Description of Translation Campaign tracking category
